hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of #gold#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Sun's Song#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple Boss Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #the Prelude of Light#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Sun's Song#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Bow#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass# and #Nayru's Love#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that there is an alcove with a Recovery Heart behind the lava wall in Dodongo's Cavern.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs# including an Upgrade one.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.
